text: Niclas Matthei (born around 2006), better known by his pseudonym Anzeigenhauptmeister (Chief Reporting Officer in English), is a young German man who became an internet meme due to reporting thousands of citizens for parking violations. The meme originated from a documentation about him from Der Spiegel, which gained more than 5 million views on YouTube. The German rapper Finch has also made a song about him. Niclas Matthei was recognized and photographed many times in public, he was even publicly attacked by people on multiple occasions. == References == Category:Internet memes Category:21st- century German people Category:Living people Category:2006 births
title: Anzeigenhauptmeister
